panels.title: AccessControl: Get contract's own context
panels.description: This only works for contracts which talk to the ACL.

panels.title: Version: Get contract implementation version
panels.description: This only works for upgradeable contracts (Entity, Policy).

panels.description: You must be an admin or an assigner for the role to do this

panels.description: You must be an admin or an assigner for the role to do this

panels.title: EntityDeployer: Deploy entity
panels.description: You must be an admin to do this

outputs.title: When next premium is due by
Market offer id for initial sale

panels.title: Policy: Pay a tranche premium directly
panels.description: Anyone can do this. Just ensure the payment token has approved the policy to transfer.

panels.title: Entity: Pay a tranche premium
panels.description: Only entity reps who are insured partys of the policy can do this.
